snippet: Numerous burglaries are being investigated at the university in Pocatello, where tensions have risen over an influx of Middle Eastern students.
abstract: Federal investigators, along with local police, are looking into burglaries of homes of Muslim students enrolled at Idaho State University in Pocatello, as well as appearance of hate literature; influx of students from Saudi Arabia and Kuwait has created tensions in area, and university president Arthur C Vailas says homes of around 50 students from Middle East have been burglarized.
lead_paragraph: Numerous burglaries are being investigated at the university in Pocatello, where tensions have risen over an influx of Middle Eastern students.

headline.main: Muslim Students Report Burglaries and Hate Literature at Idaho State
headline.print_headline: Muslim Students Report Burglaries and Hate Literature at Idaho State University
